description: Warm mitten in a shorter model with GORE-TEX membrane that makes it waterproof and highly breathable. Made of durable goatskin with a durable and stretchy softshell backhand. A neoprene cuff keeps the warmth inside the glove and provides a comfortable fit around the wrist. Perfect for downhill skiing and other outdoor activities in winter. As a mitten, it’s particularly suitable if you need a little more warmth for your fingers, but this model is also available as a five-finger glove.
name: Alpine Short GTX Mitts

specs.value: Backhand made of windproof, waterproof and breathable HESTRA Flextron (Black)

Gore-Tex - A thin PTFE membrane that behaves in the same way as human skin. It breathes, i.e. it releases excess heat and body moisture, while preventing the penetration of any moisture from outside. A wind- and waterproof material. 38% polyamide, 62% ePTFE-GORE-TEX
Brushed polyester - Durable lining with a soft feeling. The brushed surface binds more air which provides a better insulation. 100% polyester
